mapper.select: select m.order_num, m.genie_id, p.product_name, m.recipient_name, m.recipient_phone, m.recipient_address, m.recipient_request, m.recipient_delivery_status, m.order_price, m.order_qty, m.order_writedate from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param2}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id order by m.order_writedate desc;
select count(genie_id) cnt from account where genie_id=#{genie_id}
mapper.insert: insert into account(member_type, genie_id, genie_pwd) values(#{member_type},#{genie_id}, sha2(#{genie_pwd},256));

insert into seller(genie_id, company_name, ceo_name, seller_tel, seller_email, seller_website, seller_reg_no, seller_address, seller_status) values(#{genie_id}, #{company_name}, #{ceo_name}, #{seller_tel}, #{seller_email}, #{seller_website}, #{seller_reg_no}, #{seller_address}, #{seller_status});

insert into product(genie_id, product_category, product_tag, product_name, product_price, product_info, product_quantity, product_image1, product_image2, product_image3, product_mbti) values(#{genie_id}, #{product_category}, #{product_tag}, #{product_name}, ${product_price}, #{product_info}, ${product_quantity}, #{product_image1}, #{product_image2}, #{product_image3}, #{product_mbti})
mapper.select: select s.genie_id, s.company_name from account a join seller s on a.genie_id=s.genie_id where a.genie_id=#{genie_id} and a.genie_pwd=sha2(#{genie_pwd},256) and a.withdrawal=1;

select i.genie_id, i.product_id, p.product_name, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_status, i.inquiry_writedate from inquiry i join product p on i.product_id=p.product_id where i.product_id in(select product_id from product where genie_id=#{param2}) order by i.product_id asc
select sum(order_price) from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param1}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id;

select date_format(order_writedate, '%m-%d') as month_day, sum(order_price) as total_sales from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param1}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id group by month_day;
select count(order_num) order_cnt from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param1}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id;

select product_name from (select seller_id, product_id, product_name, count(product_id) as sold_cnt from (select m.order_num, m.genie_id orderer_id, m.product_id, p.product_name, p.genie_id seller_id from myorder m join product p on m.product_id = p.product_id where p.genie_id=#{param1}) a group by 1,2,3 order by sold_cnt desc limit 1) b;
